title: #cryptocircus_dreaming
body:
First of all, this is a Writing NFT written by a circus director and artist. The world is truly weird. Circus getting high on Optimism just a bit after airdrop1. Wtf is going on?

Colliding worlds shaping new planets and solar systems. Again.

![Production Meeting with t0p0s.eth Photo: Mats Bäcker](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/tMnrXELgmRYgIYIfw6mIU.jpg?height=1575&width=2362&&size=medium)

## This is not a #cryptocircus_manifesto.

[This is not a #cryptocircus_manifesto.](https://www.thesphere.as/the-sphere-manifesto/) This is a reminder that the oscillation between digital networks-with-consequences and gravity-defying afk meetings equals potential amazingness. “New financial and artistic flows generating real stuff.”

[https://twitter.com/DeSaloranta/status/1530106959004934149?s=20&t=5O1GvhTgtfEogApBT9G0pQ](https://twitter.com/DeSaloranta/status/1530106959004934149?s=20&t=5O1GvhTgtfEogApBT9G0pQ)

– Let’s create a liquidity-nimbostratus for the performing arts, shall we?
– F\*ck a pool! Let it rain!

Wet dreams of new ways of coming together. Thousands of developers and acrobats jumping in puddles. Splashing on anyone who dares to get close. Milles Puddles. Geert Lovink writes in *Stuck on the Platform-Reclaiming the Internet:*

> Connected cells of organizational units, post-platform coops with a purpose that consist of strong links, operating in opposition to the extractive “weak links” logic of a “friend of a friend” platforms. Organized networks focus on common tasks that need to be done, not on “updating” solitary users. Not *What’s New* or *What’s Happening?* but *What’s to be Done.* Please liberate us, lonely, desperate souls. Refuse, walk away. If the network is the memory of the event, and the platform the memory of the network, what’s next?

We are building web3 so that we can finally find a beautiful place to co-exist both digitally and afk, aren’t we? And yet we’re keeping a safe distans to the true meaning of the words we’re using. Let’s discuss *trust*, *trustlessness*, *public good* and *regenerative economies* but let’s do it with the intense vibrations of true *skin in the game* still resonating in our bodies and minds. Even better, let the wire walker and acrobats sit at the table with us to help us remember the striking feeling of common risk-taking. 

![t0p0s.eth on a platform in the cloud. -27℃, 3000 metres, ice under the soles. Photo: Mats Bäcker](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Phb2iFzhppjBP0EEAa7_8.jpg?height=4000&width=2667&&&size=medium)

## I’m #cryptocircus_dreaming

…and I’m certain that these worlds have to collide. Take a leap of faith and unlearn in order to drop your skepticism. The web3 and circus *[ecotone ](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ecotone)*will provide with lived experiences that will make both sides come to a mutual understanding of what needs to be done.

This Writing NFT might be minted and forgotten forever. I’m reaching here. But if enough curios collectors are out there the proceeds will be distributed as follows:

* 50% will go to making **a beautiful meeting place and cryptocircus event** at [Berlin Circus Festival](https://www.berlin-circus-festival.de/festival-en.html) 2023. Great people from crypto, digital art and circus art will be invited. [CurveLabs](https://curvelabs.eu) will be one of the partners making this amazing. They don’t know it yet. But they will. 
* 25% goes straight to thesphere.eth to make new art happen in the best of ways.
* 25% goes straight into my pocket where it will most likely turn into new art making or building an art-collection.

[The Sphere’](https://thesphere.as)s [SBT on-chain GeNFT](https://opensea.io/collection/spherical-genft)s will let you participate in great #cryptocircus activities and it’s beautiful! The ones who collect this Writing NFT before July 2022 will get one. Promise.

[https://twitter.com/pierresacoman/status/1531410645840707584?s=20&t=XOqoE88FzIP2Okk3diAsAQ](https://twitter.com/pierresacoman/status/1531410645840707584?s=20&t=XOqoE88FzIP2Okk3diAsAQ)

title: Streetwer, Music, and NFTs. A bright future!
body:
![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*1-XdhjSiM9kcSH-S4YySrA.jpeg)

I first heard of ***[NFTs](https://medium.com/data-driven-fiction/nfts-an-introduction-bb9c1839fc06)*** last year, when Beeple’s “Everydays: The First 5000 Days” was sold for $69 million. I couldn’t understand why someone would pay so much for a digital image, or as we all know them, a.jpeg, when I first heard the news. My curiosity was piqued, and I was eager to learn more about this new technology that was gaining popularity ( even if we are still early, we can see progression, especially at the start of 2022 ). I fully understand what NFTs are and how they can and will revolutionize the world after spending many hours watching videos, reading news, and blogs about them. My mind was flooded with ideas and thoughts about how this ground-breaking technology will alter a range of industries after I understood they were genuinely a digital token that signifies digital ownership. I initially confused them for .jpegs and didn’t see any future utility for them. Despite my ambition to work in several fields, I have decided to focus on and create in the two that I am most passionate about fashion and music.

![“Everydays: The First 5000 Days”](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*7-MBikCiaprgs6bW5bVSuw.jpeg)

With this article, I want to give my thoughts on how I see these two cultures evolving in the new NFT world. Let’s get this party started:

## ***Streetwear***

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*7lf5aLWb5SulcyaicYXJIw.jpeg)

I’ve been active and involved in this culture for some years, and when I first learned about NFTs in 2021 and finally understood them, I saw the incredible benefits that this technology can bring to this culture and how it can move it forward. Streetwear is a way of life. It’s a means of expressing yourself, making meaningful clothing, and building communities. Communities are at the forefront of the streetwear movement. Without a community, it will go to zero, just like any other industry. Few people realize this and are more concerned with earnings than with their people. Which, in my opinion, is a dreadful thing.

![Bobby and Ben - founders of The Hundreds.](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*2r5SXbXi5k7jtbOdtLvmhw.jpeg)

Take, for example, The Hundreds, a legendary streetwear brand that has been around for over 18 years. Why? Because they’ve always valued their community over money and other concerns. They have one of the largest, most powerful, and united communities in the world. Every business owner wishes for a community similar to their own. Trust me.

The fashion industry was changed by streetwear. Every brand, including luxury, now has its category dedicated to this culture. I feel that NFTs will do to fashion what streetwear did to it. They are going to revolutionize the industry. Digital Fashion is going to be massive. Because of them, scarcity and exclusivity will reach new heights. Communities will become more involved, committed, and better rewarded for their contributions. Please allow me to clarify.

![Puma x The Fabricant](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*sLtEk8Dmr_Lnpo9-7W1eAw.png)

Even though I believe that 2022 will be the year of Digital Fashion, I feel that it will become a large industry in the next few years. We’ve been surrounded by it for a while. We’ve been using it for a long time, but we’re unlikely to have given it any attention if we didn’t understand the concept. Take video games for example. People are willing to pay a specific amount of money for an in-game skin that improves their appearance, provides power-ups or adds other in-game features. With all the discussion about the metaverse, it’s the next logical huge thing that’s about to happen. Why? Because, just like in games, we’d like to show off the nicest outfits we can in this virtual environment. I feel that people express themselves through clothing, sneakers, and other fashion items. The attire reflects their passions, feelings, and other emotions. In the virtual world, the same principles will apply. Digital Fashion, on the other hand, has no bounds. Everything may be turned into a piece of clothing and worn. Wear your favorite pair of sneakers or jacket and decorate it with anything that comes to your mind, such as flames, wings, or other ornaments. Isn’t that incredible? In a previous ***[piece](https://medium.com/@eduardmsmr/2022-year-of-digital-fashion-8c89b0ec93ce)***, I discussed Digital Fashion and why I believe 2022 will be its year.

![Adam Bomb Squad](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*PwUkyN-sxdkehwf9k_GlwQ.jpeg)

To continue, I’ll show you an example of a streetwear brand’s NFT project that fits in well with the previous examples. I’m referring to The Hundreds’ NFT project, ***[Adam Bomb Squad](https://opensea.io/collection/adam-bomb-squad)*** (or ABS) ( You can read more about it in my latest ***[article](https://medium.com/@eduardmsmr/is-the-power-of-nfts-finally-being-noticed-by-streetwear-brands-c3ec2fe73a10)*** ). If you have one of the Bombs, you’ll get free T-shirts, early access to new releases, “allow-listing” for future NFT projects, and other promotional products, among other things. This will only benefit their community. The Hundreds are rewarding their fans for being faithful followers for a long period with this project. You may now argue that a bomb is expensive and that there is no reason to give it away for free. For those who believe this, I have a question for you: Have you ever paid $300 (converted to the current market — 0.1 ETH — This was the mint price for ABS) for a T-shirt or other item of clothing and gotten nothing in return? Consider this: you could spend $300 on a.jpeg (yep, an image) and instantly join a larger community, connect, grow, receive opportunities, and, on top of that, you could earn money from the purchase. It will be a valuable asset and investment. Consider all of the freebies and possibilities available through ABS from The Hundreds. They’re much above $300 in value. That is something I can assure you of. Exclusiveness and scarcity are created as a result of this. This phenomenon, which is common in streetwear, will reach a new level.

Communities will grow and people will become more engaged as a result of this. Consider that their idea was purchased not just by fans of The Hundreds, but also by NFT enthusiasts who noticed the project and, after conducting the necessary study, saw its potential and invested in it. These folks were introduced to The Hundreds and streetwear through ABS, and some of them would bring others on board. This means that the community expands and the culture progresses.

NFTs have the potential to add a lot to this movement and signal an important turning point in its history. The evolution of streetwear is possible, as is one of the cultures. I’m always saying that NFTs and streetwear have a lot of things in common and can learn from one another. Streetwear can learn from NFTs’ decentralization, while NFTs can benefit from streetwear’s art of collaboration. These are only two instances; you may learn more about this topic in a recent ***[post](https://medium.com/@eduardmsmr/the-parallel-between-streetwear-and-nfts-25e5513d63f0)***. I am confident that, in addition to the examples I provided, more new things and applications will emerge in streetwear, pushing it forward.

## Music

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*h8iUzuZSwgS5P7g0-WhPPQ.jpeg)

The year 2022 is when I feel the music industry will change, in my perspective. As more people become aware of NFTs, artists who are attracted by the technology yet want to learn more about it will undoubtedly recognize an opportunity and take action.

Music labels have long held control and the majority of the money. Every time an artist-generated revenue, the label received the majority of it. Everything was and continues to be governed by labels. Small artists, even if they have a small fan base, will never reach or have a slim possibility of attracting the notice of a record label. Artists are unable to reward their followers in the way they would like. I’m sure that other artists have asked themselves the same question as I did when I chose to take a break till I figured out how to accomplish it. Because of this revolutionary technology, known as NFTs, all of these things will alter.

Music NFTs came to my attention for the first time in May or June of last year. I didn’t give them much attention at first since I was so focused on fashion and other things, even though something clicked in my head whenever I read or heard the terms music and NFTs in the same sentence. In the last few weeks, I’ve decided that it’s now time to commit some time to research and learn more about this subject. I predicted that NFTs would transform a variety of industries, but I believe that by 2022, Music NFTs will have gained traction and become major.

Artists can finally make the money they deserve and earn from a track even when it is resold on the secondary market by a fan. How? By selling the NFT track on the secondary market and through NFT royalties, which is the aspect of NFTs that intrigues me the most and that I like even more.

Now, let me give you an example of how royalties work in practice:

I recently released a song and made it available on one of the Web3 providers. I’ve put the price at $100, with a 5% royalty. This means that 5% of each secondary sale will go to me. Alex from the United States admires my work and purchases the tune. I only got $100 this time. After some time, he decides to sell it for $200. He obtains $200 after selling it to Julia, and I receive $10 as a royalty. Then Julia sells it for $250 I get $12,5, and so on. Is it clear where I’m headed with this?

The artist will provide the owners early access to future releases, exclusive collaborations or merch, access to other NFT projects, and other advantages. They can do for the owners what The Hundreds are doing through ABS. Isn’t it incredible? You pay a few dollars or hundreds of dollars for a track, and then you have the opportunity to profit from it, either financially or through the benefits that come with owning it. Isn’t it fantastic? I love it!

Another aspect of Music NFTs that I admire is that it has finally arrived at a point where artists no longer require the services of a record label. They can finally be independent. Being self-employed rather than being signed to a label allows them to earn and give back more if they do things properly. Smaller musicians will now be able to profit from their work. You might wonder how this is feasible if their community is small and they don’t have a large number of listeners.

Let me give you an example from one of Rac’s (Grammy Award Winner Artist) Tweets, in which he claims that one NFT drop made him more money than his whole 15-year career as a musician, even though he has 5 million monthly Spotify listeners. Consider that for a moment. I realize you think that you have a fourth of those listeners, but if you grow your community correctly, teach them about Music NFTs and the benefits they will receive, and keep building and adding new things, I am confident you will become one of the most successful artists in the space. You just must overcome your worries or whatever is holding you back and take action. You may or may not be huge right away, but with time and persistent effort, you will get there. Have faith in me!

I believe that music will continue to exist on Web2 and that current musicians should participate in both worlds. Many people are unfamiliar with NFTs and don’t understand how they work, and some don’t have the financial resources to get involved and buy music even if they wanted to. Music NFTs will undoubtedly grow in popularity in 2022, but I don’t believe web2 music will go away very soon. There will be musicians born in digital and those who must develop in both realms (Web2 — Music Today and Web3 — Music NFTs). I believe that the success of music on Web3 is solely dependent on the artists and the messages they preach. The more musicians that talk about Music NFTs and show people the benefits it provides to both artists and the public, the more people will join the movement, and the music industry will change forever.

At this early stage, I am ecstatic to be a part of this movement. We are ahead of the curve because people are only now hearing about these new technologies, and only a small percentage of them are interested in reading and learning more about them. The cultures that I like the most will undergo significant changes in the coming years, and I am glad to say that these changes will be positive for both of them and will mark an important turning point in their history.

I’m thrilled to be building in this time, where, despite the challenges of new technologies, innovation and creativity may play a significant role in success. Despite my enthusiasm for this new market, I am developing my streetwear brand in both digital and physical areas. I have several reasons for doing so, and the next piece will be based on the following question: “Why have I opted to create a streetwear label in both realms, rather than only digitally?” It will be written and published within the next several days. I hope that by reading it and pairing it with what you’ve learned in this and previous stories, you’ll gain a greater understanding of the potential of NFTs and how they’ll impact these industries.

Another thing I’m going to start doing is producing music. Even though I spend most of my time developing my brand, I will find the time to devote to one of my greatest passions. As a result, you may hear a track signed by me shortly. I’m very excited to be building in this space!

I wanted to end this post with some personal information so that you could see and realize that I’m not just talking about things, but also attempting to put what I’ve learned into practice. Through the activities and work I do, I hope to pique your interest in learning more about the new technologies that will influence our future and inspire you to take action, become involved in things you enjoy, and start building without fear of failure. Simply be creative and clever, and you will undoubtedly achieve your objectives through hard work!

As is usual, I’ll leave you with 2 questions that I’d like to explore with you either in the comments section or on ***[Twitter](https://twitter.com/eduardmsmr/status/1490989437890985986)***:

*1. What are your thoughts on NFTs?*

*2. What impact do you anticipate NFTs will have on the fashion and music industries? What about the rest of them?*

Thank you so much for taking the time to read this! I hope this article provided you with new and useful information! Please do not hesitate to contact me! I’d love to meet everyone and learn about your stories!

\*The story was first published on Medium on February 8, 2022. I decided to relocate it here for a step-by-step migration to Web 3.0.

I wish you the best of luck! Have a wonderful day!

title: VC界，因web3开始忙碌了
body:
6月20日，本基金资本投资6月20日宣布新投666天，由**软银愿景二、GGV纪源资本领领NZHolding**和跟投、10T基金、10T资本基金投资。笔融资结束后，InfStones总融资金额超1亿美元，正式跻身独角兽之列。

 
 

亿火爆的美元Web31月在我们B轮到B，0轮融资B轮融资——Babel财务，200万美元，2000万美元，上百万美元，上百万美元周报完成超过20亿美元；是Afriex、Oasi、Cyber​​Connect ...........上面已经出现了中国美元VC的新闻。

 
 

“**当年TMT的那波朋友，开始去新加坡看Web3项目**。”告别互联网时代，国内美元开始启动。 最近朱啸虎被转为Web3投了最合适的跑鞋StepN，直播指向为庞氏移动跑鞋StepN。显然，这是一场演讲的舞台，Web3着未来还是一场谎言？

 
 如果问今天的中国VC在忙什么，可以先从要诞生的一只独角兽说起——

 
 

今天，基金基础投资0期新万美元发行轮投完成，该由**软银愿景就6660期二期、GGV纪领领，渭基金投**、10T Fund、SNZ Holding和A&T Capital。 3 年前，InfStones 轮官方宣布了 300 万美元融资，至此，InfStones 总融资超过 100 亿美元，正式跻身独立。

 
 

在广泛使用的区块链区块链基础设施（PaaSfS）这个平台上，在这个行业发起、施治治治，以及在美国助学行业的企业家、执行治治的吴佐助科学圈内，发现了一个广泛使用的社区链振服务，曾在甲骨文高级工程师。

 
 

该，振吴博士曾这样描述：“InfStone 创建了世界上最强大的 Web3 开发平台，开发者可以在上开箱即用式地访问和使用 50 多条平台施区块链协议协议支持多种世界上所有其他开发平台在不损害我们的损害、安全性、安全性和访问性方面实现了速度和能力，平台实现了对全球范围内最广泛的开发者可扩展性的开发性部署。目标AWS的服务带入Web3领域。”

 
 

翻开InfStones投资方，还看到了**启明创投、SIG海纳亚洲等中国VC**的照片，HashKey Capital、Dragonfly Capital、DHVC、A&T Capital和Value Internet Fund等也是其老股东。写蜻蜓资本，这家隐秘的VC基金与红杉中国还颇有渊源。

 
 

时间回到2021年1月，**杉杉中国宣布成为蜻蜓基金的战略合伙人**，完成了对蜻蜓基金的投资，百度红创始人徐勇、曾前总参谋长鸣也在这份公开信息里。

 
 

Dragonfly，来自数字资本的蜻蜓，是一家专注于有区块链行业的风险投资基金。不久前，红中国和蜻蜓资本以6000万美元的估值联合了非洲的Web3领域企业Afriex。

 
 

成为了企业在VC/PE3上流传的火热关键词，即使是在最冷清的投资圈最热发年份，Web3领域的依然在此起彼伏，并且中国VC在这片领域的出手也越来越活跃：

 
 

5月25日，加密金融服务美元轮股，25亿美元B股金融完成B股，参投环球20亿股，等环球投资基金、白羊股等VC机构投资老股本、BAI中国资本基金是股东；5月18日，总部位于新加坡的Web3技术企业NodeReal获云九资本投出1600万美元一轮融资；几乎同天，云九资本、GGV纪源还联手投资了Web3社交平台Cyber​​Connect。

 
 

早在 8800 万美元基金之前，环球安全认证完成了 8800 万美元 B3，缔造了区块链安全单项赛事，最大的融资轮融资企业举行了 20 亿美元的比赛，其身后已经聚集了包括盛大、高价的、红杉资本、Coatue、IDG、高瓴投等中国VC/PE圈创的名人。

 
 

以及今年月，85后投资的张津剑掌的洲领投了Web3元资本投资的网络3元资本，绿洲的数轮资本资本也包括五源资本。 、险峰K2VC和清晗基金等中国VC机构。

 
 

如我们所见，VC们在早期投资中热衷于抱团下注的现象，在Web3领域也得淋淋淋漓尽致。一时间，Web3美元VC成为最火热的概念，让你再不投掉队了。

title: No one is building the metaverse.
body:
### 1. The metaverse is interconnected

These companies are not building the metaverse, they are building *metaWorlds.* 

The metaverse is not built in siloes, not owned by a single company, nor exists on a single blockchain. 

Users and their avatars can freely explore from world to world. 

Metalistings (MLS) is the embodiment of this connected hyper reality. 

### 2. Virtual worlds vs the metaverse

Virtual worlds have existed since the 2000s in games like World of Warcraft, Eve Online, Runescape, & Animal Crossing…

The difference now is ownership.

With NFTs, people could prove scarcity, non-fungability, and provenance. 

If real estate was ownership in real life, then virtual land is ownership of the metaverse. 

### 3. Digital scarcity is a myth 

But the scarcity of attention in the IoT is irrefutable.

Like your iphone home page, valuable digital real estate exists, just in different mediums.

Web2 social media has shown us that people, with their finite attention, aggregate to social hubs. 

Such is the case in the metaverse. 

Coding new land doesn’t mean people will go there - people go where other people are. 

The scarcity of attention is the real reason why virtual real estate will continue to have value. 

### 4. Good virtual property is like a top level domain.

Hotels.com was worth $11M in 2001. Web traffic, ease of access through SEO, is now foot traffic, and ease of access through genesis plaza. Presently, the virtual Manhattan is on discount. 

### 5. Make new things old, and old things new 

The easiest way to sell something new is to make it old. 

Real estate is an old.

Drawing similarities between metaverses and real estate, we’ll onboard the next billion users. 

### 6. Since you cannot eat or sleep in virtual land…

It’s a place of social congregation and consumption. This is means that the metaverse is a new social layer. A place of experiences. 

Land is only as valuable as the experiences that are on the land. 

So there is no such thing, now at least, as residential real estate. It’s all commercial. 

### 7. If you put all the metaWorlds on one platform:

You make it easier to understand their similarities and differences. This overview takes the fear out of learning about the metaverse. 

Once you aggregate enough users and worlds, new worlds will look to you to be a launchpad. 

Like the NASDAQ, you will get to dictate what traits and entry requirements are needed to be defined as the next Initial Land Offering. 

As more worlds come into existence that fit these requirements, these requirements will soon be the similarities that become the portals between each world. 

Know that because of these boundaries, people will be more creative for a time. Many worlds will make money, but only a few will survive. 

In the end most users will aggregate to a few of the worlds that remain.

These worlds will be interconnected, DAO governed, ushering in the real metaverse. 

## We are early, there are betterverses on the horizon. 

![metalistings is a portal to metaverse real estate.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/YDAa2nP_ldvYOQzt0L9Er.png?height=628&width=960)

title: 掌权者对我下命令，我就一定得照做？│ 林前11:10 做个记号
body:
**罗马书‬13:1-2**
在上有权柄的，人人当顺服他，
因为没有权柄不是出神的。
凡掌权的都神所命的。
所以，抗拒掌权的就是抗拒神的命；
抗拒的必自取刑罚。

圣经告诉我们要顺服掌权者。那么是不是掌权者的所有命令我都必须遵行呢？

老板让我做假账，我也要做吗？ 
 政府不许我传道，我就不传吗？

当然不是。

注意在第二节保罗说：抗拒掌权的，就是抗拒神的命。 
 这句话反过来也成立：顺服掌权的，就是顺服神的命。

如果顺服掌权者，会导致我违背从神而来的命令，那我还应该顺服吗？

答案是：**你要顺服人，但不必服从**。

![顺服 ≠ 服从](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ZYG0Z-5-8P2tHZbZYdYGa.jpg?height=1728&width=3072)

服从就是照做。我们应当服从神，照着神的话去做。但在人和人的关系上，顺服是一个更贴切的词。**顺服是一种恭敬、尊重的态度**。**这种对人的尊重和恭敬，立足于神对世人——对全世界的每个人——无条件的爱**。

‪**约翰福音‬3:16-17**  
 神爱世人， 
 甚至将他的独生子赐给他们， 
 叫一切信他的，不至灭亡，反得永生。 
 因为神差他的儿子降世， 
 不是要定世人的罪（或作“审判世人”。下同）， 
 乃是要叫世人因他得救。

神既是这样爱我们，我们也当彼此相爱。怀着这样的爱，有了这样恭敬、尊重的态度，你就会尽量去配合上级的要求。**实在配合不了的话，也不妨碍你继续怀着恭敬与尊重对待他**。

![对人的恭敬和尊重，是出于神对世人无条件的爱](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/yydbX4D4_xPNetefCyC8W.jpg?height=440&width=785)

**新约里所有关于”顺服人“的经文，不是彼得写的，就是保罗写的**。从这两个人对掌权者的态度里，我们就能明白什么是顺服。

在使徒行传第4章，彼得在美门口治好了一个瘸腿的人，结果就被逮捕了。第二天，官府、长老，和文士在耶路撒冷聚会， 几位大祭司和他们的亲族也都在。他们质问使徒说：你们用什么能力，奉谁的名做这事？

那时彼得被圣灵充满——注意他是在圣灵充满的状态下回答祭司和官长的话——对他们说：“治民的官府和长老啊，……站在你们面前的这人得痊愈是因你们所钉十字架、神叫他从死里复活的拿撒勒人耶稣基督的名……“**彼得以平民百姓的身份对他们说话，而且一上来就承认了他们作为执政掌权者的地位**。

然后，彼得对他们传讲耶稣基督之名。

虽然这个名是掌权者们最不愿意听见的，可彼得仍然抓住一切机会，把福音也传给这些人。**他所行的神迹，和他有理有节、不卑不亢的态度，叫掌权者们大大”希奇“，而且”无话可驳“**。

![彼得被圣灵充满，对官长和祭司长说话](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/tBNRMkViY9jVuLJp3g0_M.jpg?height=768&width=1024)

最后他们实在没法子，就把使徒恐吓一番，禁止他们奉耶稣的名讲论教训人。**面对这样毫无道理的要求，可同时又是来自权威的压力，彼得是怎么回答的**？

‪**使徒行传‬4:19-20**
彼得、约翰说： 
 “听从你们，不听从神， 
 这在神面前合理不合理，你们自己酌量吧！  
 我们所看见所听见的，不能不说。”

彼得自己说过：百姓要顺服君王。可他却在众人面前这样跟官长们顶嘴？——这就是顺服，但却不服从。**彼得没有服从官长和祭司的命令，因为他们的命令与神的话相悖**。**但彼得仍然尊重官府的权威、承认国家的法律，哪怕这个法律制订得并不合理**。他没有多费口舌跟官长和祭司们争辩，只是礼貌、克制地告诉他们：要杀要剐是你们的决定，而我已经决定了要听从神。

他顺服的结果是什么？——他们被释放，回到会友那里，所有人一起祷告，聚会的地方就被神的大能震动了！主就照他们所求的，赐给他们胆量和口才，也伸出祂的手来医治疾病，使神迹奇事因着耶稣的名多多行出来。

![先有顺服神和尊敬人的态度，祷告就带下了神的大能](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/mbcTQhIllu7XIILpyYJka.jpg?height=768&width=1024)

保罗也是一样。**他带四个人去圣殿里行洁净的礼，因为他要向耶路撒冷的犹太教会表明他对摩西律法的顺服**——向律法以下的人，他虽不在律法以下，还是作律法以下的人，为要得律法以下的人。但即使这样，从亚细亚来的犹太人还是诽谤他，说他把外邦人带进圣殿，污秽圣所，怂恿众人抓住他。

第二天千夫长来审问。保罗才说了一句话，大祭司亚拿尼亚就吩咐旁边站着的人打他的嘴。这让保罗感到委屈又生气。

‪**使徒行传‬23:3-5**   
 保罗对他说：“你这粉饰的墙，神要打你！ 
 你坐堂为的是按律法审问我，你竟违背律法，吩咐人打我吗？”  
 站在旁边的人说：“你辱骂　神的大祭司吗？”  
 保罗说：“弟兄们，我不晓得他是大祭司；经上记着说：‘不可毁谤你百姓的官长。’”

保罗指责那个审判他的人是“粉饰的墙”，还说“神要打你”，这听起来就是语气很重的骂人吵架的话了。但当旁边的人告诉他，这个“粉饰的墙”是神的大祭司，保罗就还是压下怒气，表明自己并不是针对大祭司，只是在抗议这个随便打人巴掌的行为，因为这个行为违背了律法。

简单来说，保罗的意思是他对事不对人。**不管对方是不是祭司，他随便打人，保罗都会抗议，也会拿起律法的武器保护自己的权利**。**这并非不尊重祭司的职分，只是不认同打人巴掌的行为**。

![保罗的反击是对事不对人，更不是针对神所设立的祭司制度和摩西的律法](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/bWTFaJhsb1x77EuPSimwN.jpg?height=768&width=1024)

尊重官长和祭司，并不代表你同意他们的看法**。**但**即使不同意，也还是要尊重，因为你不仅是在把他们作为“神所爱的世人”来尊重，更是尊重他们的“职位”**。职位可以由不同人来坐，有人做得好，有人做得坏，但职位本身的属性不会变。这些职位是神设立的，“凡掌权的都是神所命的”，与职位相匹配的权柄也是从神而来。承认这个权柄的等次，就是顺服神。**只有你顺服了，你有话好好对人说，那么在你有话对神祷告时，你的祷告才是有效的**；在你向世人——包括审问你、挑衅你、逼迫你的人——传讲福音时，你的话语才会带下神的大能。

这是什么原理呢？我们可以从保罗讲顺服的一段经文里找到答案：

‪**哥林多前书‬11:5,10**  
 凡女人祷告或是讲道，若不蒙着头，就羞辱自己的头， 
 因为这就如同剃了头发一样。…… 
 因此，女人为天使的缘故，应当在头上有服权柄的记号。

我们为天使的缘故，应当在头上有服权柄的记号。在当年保罗所处的社会文化中，这个记号是指蒙住头发，而在今天我们所处的社会文化中，这个记号是指对人的恭敬和尊重。**我口中和气的言语，加上我尊重并且尽量配合的态度，就是我顺服权柄的记号**。我顺服是为天使的缘故，因为

**‪希伯来书‬1:14**  
 天使岂不都是服役的灵、 
 奉差遣为那将要承受救恩的人效力吗？

![每个承受救恩的人，都能差遣天使为我们效力](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/KSZFrBqD2ViB9ZmgNSEUF.jpg?height=420&width=800)

我们的祷告能发动天使，所以彼得被关在监狱里，第二天就要死刑示众，教会为他切切祷告神，就有天使向他显现，半夜领他走出了监狱的大门。这对初期教会的人来说并不是一件新鲜事，甚至彼得回到自己人那里，众人还不敢相信是他，说：“这必是他的天使！”

**差遣天使的前提，是我们在头上有服权柄的记号**。等我们顺服了，神的天使就会因我们的祷告应声而动，去为我们在灵界里对付魔鬼、扫清障碍，在我们目力所不能及的地方，为我们铺平前面的道路。

所以我们看到彼得和保罗屡遭逼迫，屡次入狱，却因一路有天使保守而次次得以脱险。他们遭受逼迫，是因为不肯服从官府和犹太公会的禁令，四处去传耶稣基督的福音。他们得拯救，是因为他们在逼迫中始终保持了对权柄的顺服，和对掌权者们的尊重。**他们在头上有服权柄的记号，所以他们的每次祷告都能带下神的大能，也让福音得以传到更远的地方**。

![差遣天使的前提，是我们在头上有服权柄的记号](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Wmnrnc09uosDf-lGHOqCJ.jpg?height=768&width=1024)

因此当我们面对掌权者的要求时，要自己做一个判断：如果去做这件事，会不会让我良心有愧？这件事是否从违背了神的命令？在新约时代，最大的诫命就是爱。**爱是不加害于人的，所以爱就完全了律法。那我去做这件事，本质是爱人还是在害人**？

**想清楚这个问题后，该服从的就服从**——当得粮的，给他纳粮；当得税的，给他上税；当惧怕的，惧怕他；当恭敬的，恭敬他——**如果不应该服从，该有的恭敬也还是应该有**。你可以怀着温柔、敬畏的心，怀着顺服的态度，向对方说明你不能配合的缘由。

**‪彼得前书‬3:13-15**  
 你们若是热心行善，有谁害你们呢？  
 你们就是为义受苦，也是有福的。 
 不要怕人的威吓（“的威吓”或作“所怕的”），也不要惊慌； 
 只要心里尊主基督为圣。 
 有人问你们心中盼望的缘由，就要常作准备， 
 以温柔、敬畏的心回答各人；

不要惊慌，不要惧怕。不要怕人的威吓，也不要怕别人所怕的。**顺服归根到底是为了行善，有什么比传福音更大的善呢**？福音让人明白真道，得着耶稣基督里丰盛的生命。**当你为基督的缘故去爱人、恭敬人、顺服人的时候，就是天使为你效力，圣灵与你同工，让你在人前成为福音见证的时刻**。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/meTiIfpNK7gyedfuK83Ka.png?height=2688&width=1242)

title: Is the power of NFTs finally being noticed by streetwear brands?
body:
![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*9RprUbV9mlTreF2BkDefaQ.jpeg)

Streetwear is my beloved culture and one that I will never tire of talking about. It’s amazing. Everything about it is great and inspires people: the people, the styles, the music, etc. Stussy came up with the brilliant concept of screen-printing a white logo on a black T-shirt to promote sales in the 1980s, and streetwear was born. It was a massive success. Other brands and cultures were introduced to streetwear after Sussy’s creation, but more about its creation can be found in this ***[article](https://medium.com/@eduardmsmr/streetwear-taking-the-first-steps-into-the-culture-32be66eb181b)***.

Although this culture has existed for more than 30 years, it has only been in the last few years that streetwear has revolutionized the fashion industry and become a necessity for any brand or store, including luxury, thanks to various collaborations. As I’ve mentioned before, streetwear is both a culture and a movement. Community, story-telling, attitude, fantastic art, and more are all part of its culture, and it would be nothing without them.

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*jYfknsY6y6z88ls8UgyHwA.jpeg)

**Bored Ape Yacht Club — Most successful & popular collection at the moment**

***[NFTs](https://medium.com/data-driven-fiction/nfts-an-introduction-bb9c1839fc06)***… I discovered them in March 2021, and have spent most of my time since then educating myself on this new technology and looking for ideas and answers on how to create and drive the culture forward by merging streetwear and NFTs. While researching them more, I discovered that these two movements have a lot in common and can learn a lot from one another. NFTs, for example, can learn from streetwear collaborations (which are starting to occur but will be discussed later in this article) or streetwear can learn from NFT decentralization. 

![Qiyana’s in-game skin made by Louis Vuitton](https://miro.medium.com/max/1300/1\*VltD0URRl4aA4tl8VoZoUQ.jpeg)

Isn’t it true that NFTs are digital? When we think of streetwear, we either think of Digital Fashion or an NFT art project with diverse utility, but for the time being, we’ll stick with Digital Fashion. Many brands have worked on collaborations with various digital games in recent years. For the 2019 League of Legends World Championship Finals in Paris, Louis Vuitton collaborated with Riot Games to develop a bespoke travel case for the Summoner’s Cup trophy, prestige skins for two champions, and other digital assets. Physical goods were also made to match the skins in the game.

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*mngELL3aySFDJ9-d0iYhzg.jpeg)

**Balenciaga x Fortnite**

Balenciaga x Fortnite is a more recent partnership that is likely to be more popular. Last year, digital fashion made its first appearance in Fortnite. Ramirez, Doggo, and other characters were able to express themselves in new ways thanks to the Balenciaga Fit Set. The luxury label’s fashion, free sprays, the Strange Times Featured Hub, which built a virtual Balenciaga store that matched the real ones, and a live photography campaign were all brought to life within the gaming set. Physical duplicates of those seen in the game were also made available.

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1164/1\*pFHEbf8ljRgb1mKMmiOfpA.jpeg)

**Honor of Kings x Burberry**

Aside from these two collaborations, there has been a slew of others, like Gucci x Roblox, Honor of Kings x Burberry, etc., all of which demonstrate the fashion industry’s desire to enter the digital arena. Fans go crazy and love what they create every time one of them collaborates with a game or other digital product and releases digital fashion. The only issue is that we, as users and purchasers of those skins and other digital goods, will not benefit from them. They’ll only be used in-game, and they’ll be useless after the game is closed. NFTs, on the other hand, disrupt this.

Have you ever wished for more as a reward for being a loyal customer of a brand? Have you ever desired special items or collaborations? Have you ever wanted to purchase a limited-edition item but couldn’t due to bots on the market? If you answered yes to these questions, then I can tell you that NFTs are the answer. They will become a reality thanks to this technology. Different fashion brands have issued or will release Digital Fashion and NFTs collections, which provide people exclusivity, ownership, the opportunity to profit from reselling the item, and access to exclusive items, events, or other things generated by the specific brand. Isn’t that incredible? You will now feel like a true member of the brand, with access to everything you’ve ever wanted and more simply by purchasing and holding a token. This technology will undoubtedly transform and advance streetwear and fashion cultures.

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*ye6AHSymBvYApjqse6iARg.jpeg)

We had the opportunity to watch various fashion labels join the NFT movement last year and at the start of this one. Gap’s NFT partnership with a gamified digital experience, Burberry’s first NFT housed within Blankos Block Party, and others. Even though I’d like to discuss more all of the brands that have filled this space, I’ve opted to focus on three or four of them that I believe have had and continue to have an impact on the fashion industry and beyond. As I previously stated, the ones I will bring to you today are not the only ones who have done so, and they are certainly not the last. Many more brands will realize the possibility and join this area shortly. Let’s get started with the first label:

## ***Adidas Originals: “Into the Metaverse”***

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1260/1\*T7LMVxuTF2XL91lCZhhNoA.png)

A change was made to Adidas’ official Twitter page on December 2, 2021. An Ape was used in place of their usual profile photo, which included their logo. BAYC #8774, “Indigo Herz,” has been their official PFP and symbol since that day. Gmoney, PUNKS Comic, and, of course, Bored Ape Yacht Club were the driving forces behind this shift. It wasn’t a surprising move, given that they had released some news on Twitter a month before the acquisition, letting those already working in the field know that something was in the works. Adidas, for example, purchased space in TheSandBox on November 22nd and inked a collaboration with Coinbase on November 24th. These were unmistakable signs of the brand’s direction.

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*oyRrvq1tbUvIBZF_YM_DIg.jpeg)

Gmoney, PUNKS Comic, and the Bored Ape Yacht Club assisted Adidas Originals in their journey Into the Metaverse on December 17, 2021. The NFT is a limited-edition collectible that marks their collaboration by providing holders with rare collaborative tangible products as well as continued digital utility. The quantity of NFTs is capped at 30,000, with a mint price of 0.2 ETH. On the secondary market, the item is now selling for 0.96 ETH (about $2.500 + Gas).

Because Adidas is one of the most well-known and recognized brands in the industry, I chose to specify this project. Even if other fashion brands’ initiatives were established before Adidas’s, I believe the way they achieved it by purchasing a BAYC, working with industry pioneers, purchasing property, and so on had a stronger influence on consumers than simply launching an NFT collection and calling it a day. Millions of individuals have undoubtedly seen their new PFP, questioned what it was, and wanted to learn more about it, and I am confident that at least a quarter of them have recognized the value of NFTs and hopped aboard.

## ***Nike acquisition of RTFKT***

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*VF8U8RSvaxS35KmAgXUi2w.jpeg)

I’d like to introduce you to RTFKT first because everyone has heard of Nike. RTFKT (pronounced “Artifact”) studio was founded by three friends at the start of the COVID era, and it was “born on the metaverse,” as they claim. It’s known for making virtual sneakers, memes, and other limited-edition collectibles. RTFKT’s mission is to “create the first digital-first fashion label.” The FEWOCIOUS x RTFKT sneaker collection debuted in early March 2021. Even though the prices ranged from $3000 to $10,000 per shoe, some collectors were not intimidated, and in less than 7 minutes, they had spent $3.1 million on the three shoe drops. The real sneakers were finally shipped out in July 2021, four months after the debut. This is the collection that first introduced RTFKT to the attention of the general audience. Collaborations with Jeff Staple (an influential figure in the streetwear scene), Takashi Murakami (the most recent of which is CloneX), and others followed the great success of their three shoe releases. In a nutshell, here is the chronology of their collaborations and releases.

One of the founders stated in one of the interviews that I listened to that they’ve always wanted to be a digital version of Nike. It didn’t take long for Nike to notice them and the possibility to put them under their umbrella, thanks to their vision and high-quality releases. As a result, everyone was taken aback on December 13, 2021, when both Nike and RTFKT revealed that Nike had acquired the cherished Studio. People started debating whether it was a wise decision or not because they were a web3 company and only built in this manner when they were bought by a Web2 titan. Everyone has an opinion, but if Nike understands this new place and what people desire, I am confident that they will offer nothing but gold and help to propel this world ahead. We’ll have to wait and see what the future has in store for us!

## ***The Hundreds: Adam Bomb Squad ( ABS )***

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1216/1\*NX_wLPtkBO3sQNUr9XAH0A.png)

Bobby Kim and Ben Shenassafar, law school classmates, founded the Hundreds streetwear brand in 2003. It began as a blog, then started selling T-shirts, and was named the fifth greatest streetwear brand of all time in 2011. This claim, I feel, cannot be disputed by anyone familiar with The Hundreds’ culture. When I first became interested in streetwear tradition, I wanted to learn more about what it means, how it is expressed, and how it has evolved, and when I came across The Hundreds, I immediately recognized that this label has streetwear in its name, basis, and everything. They are, among others, a representative of this culture.

It is one of the longest-running streetwear labels, having been around for over 19 years. They’ve survived for so long, in my opinion, because they’ve always put their community first, preaching tales, creating meaningful and expressive designs, and choosing to collaborate with brands not because of the “name,” but because they truly enjoyed it. I have nothing but admiration and respect for what they’ve done to our culture and how they continue to push it forward.

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*PwUkyN-sxdkehwf9k_GlwQ.jpeg)

The Hundreds’ NFT project, Adam Bomb Squad ( or ABS ), was launched on Friday, August 27th, and it was a significant day for them. ABS has a total of 25,000 different bomb combinations. Adam has become the face of The Hundreds, as well as a streetwear generation, over the last 15 years. He made cameo appearances in Pixar films and climbed to the top of the tallest Times Square billboard. It was a straightforward decision to create an NFT collection with Adam as the main figure because he is one of the most well-loved and recognizable mascots in fashion. NFTs are the next evolution of Adam Bomb Squad representation. You’ll get a variety of perks if you hold one of the Bombs, including free T-shirts, early access to new releases, “allow-listing” for future NFT projects, other promotional products, and more. I don’t see why someone shouldn’t be an owner of ABS. The Bombs now have a floor price of 1.1 ETH (about $2,800), but I believe it is worthwhile to spend this money on a.jpeg for the benefits that you will receive.

The fact that I knew the streetwear culture was moving forward was what got me the most thrilled when I heard The Hundreds was launching an NFT collection. They were undoubtedly going to introduce something new to both the streetwear and NFT spaces, and I was correct. Initially, they offered exclusivity by leveraging NFTs as a means for early access to drops or by giving holders free T-shirts, among other things. This was accomplished by tokenizing their website to determine who is and is not a holder. Preaching and attracting more people to this new space, as well as seeking ways to introduce streetwear to NFTs and vice versa, could only be healthy for both communities.

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*L07mm9recnxrdK5igxPbLA.jpeg)

The most essential point thing that the NFT space must learn from streetwear is the need for collaboration. This was overlooked by the NFT community. We’ve witnessed the influence of the FEWOUCIOUS x RTFK on the market, but there haven’t been many after then. This is about to change, as The Hundreds announced last month collaborations between ABS and three NFT projects that are well-liked by the community: DEADFELLAZ, Smilesss, and BRAiN VOMiT. Apart from the fact that The Hundreds continue to distribute solely gold to their community in real life, they continue to do it through ABS as well. These collaborations were done for the people and communities on both sides, and one thing I particularly admire about them is that they are attempting to incorporate elements of streetwear culture into the NFT, and they are succeeding brilliantly! It’s fantastic!

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*TEgc80-Bhj65rxZh5vgIwA.jpeg)

As you may have guessed, this is perhaps the project that excites me the most, but there are good reasons for that, as I’ve explained in previous articles. I’m excited to see where the project goes and what collaborations or other fascinating things ABS can provide for us.

## ***A Bathing Ape ( BAPE )***

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*w0KdDMLnJCpk-yXdhbBI9g.jpeg)

This concludes this article’s examples. Even though their project has not yet been out, I wanted to include BAPE because if you are a true streetwear fan, you know that history and culture would have looked very different without BAPE and Nigo’s presence. NIGO created A Bathing Ape in 1993, and it has had a significant impact on streetwear culture since then. Discover the complete story in this piece, where I discuss the origins of streetwear and how it all began.

Their NFT project, the (B)APETAVERSE, promises BAPE fans exclusive content and other opportunities. There will be a total of 10,000 unique NFTs, and the blacked-out teaser image looks magnificent. The release date for (B)Apetaverse is unknown, but you may learn more about it by visiting their beautiful website and joining their Discord group.

We’ve come to the end of this post, and I’d want to share some views with you about the subjects I’ve covered so far. I’m delighted to see brands like Adidas or Nike, and I’m excited to see what they have in store for us soon, but seeing OG streetwear labels like BAPE or a streetwear icon like The Hundreds as part of this new movement get my excitement to the moon. Why? Because knowing NFTs and streetwear can only benefit both cultures, these moves can only be beneficial. They’re pretty similar, and when combined properly, they can make amazing things. Physical streetwear, I feel, will not go away anytime soon, but NFTs are a fantastic way to add a new chapter to its history and culture.

Before I leave, I’d like to ask you a few questions about which I’d love to hear from you in the comments or on ***[Twitter](https://twitter.com/eduardmsmr/status/1489546428041109506)***:

*1. What are your thoughts on the above-mentioned brands? Do you believe they’ll bring anything good or negative to the space?*

*2. Which brands do you want to see join the NFT movement?*

*3. What impact do you expect NFTs will have on the streetwear industry?*

I am looking forward to reading your answers!

\*The story was first published on Medium on February 4, 2022. I decided to relocate it here for a step-by-step migration to Web 3.0.

Thank you very much!

Have a wonderful day!

body:
**\[项目简介 - Yield\]**

* Yield Protocol 是一个固定利率借贷协议
* 支持网络：以太坊主网/Arbitrum
* 融资背景：2021 年6 月宣布完成 1000 万美金融资，Paradigm，NEXO，Variant等。

1、先将小狐狸钱包切换到 Arbitrum 网络，如果首次使用可以通过 [chainlist.defillama.com](https://chainlist.defillama.com/)搜索进行一键添加。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/MsA_Jm-3fAiRNA04ExurF.png?height=457&width=926)

2：Borrow（借入）

进入[官网](https://app.yieldprotocol.com/)，连接钱包。目前只支持ETH 和DAI做为抵押物，抵押物种类还是比较少。准备好抵押物。最低借款金额100u，点击进入下一步。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/iQA_Unoh7ZW-hM_6t5q_J.png?height=786&width=1166)

3、弹出新页面，选择抵押物币种。比如借100U，提示需要最低抵押0.112个ETH。有清算的风险，建议多质押一些。刷空投就走个流程。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/HT6FcTkjHpqyRWLH0t5VZ.png?height=794&width=1176)

4、确认各项数据，完成抵押及借贷。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/_zEx24h8yL-6nrgWR0NuH.png?height=793&width=1177)

5：LEND（借出）

借出 DAI 或USDC 来赚取收益。借出门槛为 100U，没有存款时间的限制，随时都可以取出或者存入。同样，需要在设定的时间之后赎回才会有奖励。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/UgIJJSd1zWnZF9Ue597M5.png?height=778&width=1170)

6、Pool（流动池）：和借出一样，存入的资金用于维护协议的运行，在规定时间之后取出就能获得收益。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/WtE6nBG20GPSorRS6GpiQ.png?height=775&width=1127)

7、撤销流动性

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/GOSMZjuNbSBx7BplwOmzp.png?height=724&width=1224)

以上是Yield的一个交互流程，Arbitrum生态交互教程将陆续，后续进度欢迎进群交流：

微信：280022

推特： <https://twitter.com/nft9191>

title: Metamaverick Notes #69
body:
\#民众唯一能依靠的只有民众自己#

**投融资**

NFT 租赁市场 Playdex 获得 200 万美元种子轮融资，本轮融资由菲律宾加密货币交易平台 PDAX、Orange DAO 和 BukoVentures 领投。Playdex 是一个允许游戏玩家和公会从 NFT 持有者手中租用游戏资产的在线市场，计划利用本轮资金加速产品开发、扩大社区规模，并将更多游戏整合到平台中。<https://e27.co/coins-ph-founder-ron-hoses-new-nft-rental-marketplace-playdex-nets-us2m-20220602/>

专注于加密衍生品的**数据分析平台 Laevitas** 宣布完成 250 万美元种子轮融资，本轮融资由三箭资本和 DeFiance Capital 领投，CMS、Astronaut Capital 等参投。本轮融资资金将用于 Laevitas 扩展其对加密衍生品市场的分析和研究套件，并在 DeFi 衍生品、期权定价和风险管理等领域提供全面的分析工具。<https://medium.com/laevitas/announcing-our-2-5m-seed-round-a58d349282f2>

数字资产投资平台 Sandbank 运营商 DA Ground 完成约合 200 万美元A 轮融资，本轮融资由韩国 DAOU KIWOOM 集团子公司 Korea Information Certification 领投。<https://decenter.kr/NewsView/267391AVX3>

Web3 粉丝平台 Gaudiy Fanlink 母公司 **Gaudiy** 宣布完成 1922 万美元B 轮融资，本轮融资 SBI Investment、万代南梦宫旗下 Web3.0 及元宇宙基金 Bandai Namco Entertainment、日本通信巨头 KDDI、STRIVE 以及 JAFCO Group 等参投。Gaudiy Fanlink 是一个经 IP 授权的 Web3 粉丝平台，索尼音乐娱乐、日本综合出版社集英社、万代南梦宫娱乐、索尼音乐娱乐旗下 Aniplex 均使用了 Gaudiy Fanlink 服务。Gaudiy Fanlink 致力于降低娱乐公司 IP 运营成本，提升粉丝价值。<https://prtimes.jp/main/html/rd/p/000000036.000035719.html>

去中心化电子协议签署平台 **EthSign** 宣布正式上线 Signatures Beta 版本，新版本提供与 Web2 电子签名平台相同的功能、用户体验和法律有效性，同时运用区块链提高透明度和安全性。<https://twitter.com/ethsign/status/1532144824962383874>

冥想元宇宙应用 Tripp 宣布完成 1120 万美元融资，本轮融资 Bitkraft Ventures、Amazon Alexa Fund、高通（Qualcomm）、HTC、Niantic 和 Mayfield 等参投。融资将发展 Tripp 中增强现实 (AR)、虚拟现实 (VR) 和移动应用程序，以满足用户精神保健需求。<https://venturebeat.com/2022/06/01/tripp-raises-11-2m-to-build-the-mindful-metaverse/>

机构加密交易平台 Genesis 向机构借贷协议 Maple Finance 投入 7500 万美元来扩大其去中心化金融（DeFi）业务。<https://www.theblockcrypto.com/linked/149664/genesis-is-parking-75-million-in-capital-into-maples-solana-based-lending-platform>

基于 Solana 的 **Move to Earn 链游 Walken** 宣布完成 470 万美元融资，本轮融资由 Infinity Ventures Crypto 与 Shima Capital 领投。Walken 将加密奖励与步行、跑步等体力活动结合起来，通过持续移动或赢得比赛来提升玩家在游戏中的角色，同时帮助玩家培养更健康的生活习惯。<https://cointelegraph.com/press-releases/move-to-earn-wellness-project-walken-seals-47m-funding-round>

基于华为云的 P2E 链游 Revoland 宣布完成 1060 万美元种子轮和预售轮融资，HashKey Capital 和 Polygon Ventures 领投。Revoland 是一款基于区块链的多人在线战斗竞技场游戏，通过 Play-to-Earn 模式吸引玩家，玩家可以召集朋友组建团队，与他人战斗，并因其技能而获得 Token 奖励。<https://financefeeds.com/revoland-raises-10-6m-to-boost-its-blockchain-game-adoption/>

**链上 OTC 平台 SIZE** 完成 600 万美元种子轮融资，三箭资本、Wintermute 和 Mgnr 领投，Alameda Research、D1 Ventures 和 Genblock Capital 等参投。SIZE 使用户可以轻松参与已归属或未归属 Token 的密封投标拍卖。<https://www.theblockcrypto.com/linked/149625/size-raises-6-million-backed-by-three-arrows-wintermute-mgnr-and-more?utm_source=twitter&utm_medium=social>

**NFT应用**

NFT 交易市场 ZORA 发布 ZORA API，供开发者轻松创建自己的 NFT 市场、应用和平台。<https://twitter.com/ourZORA/status/1532071848090882053?s=20&t=ufc-Ucr_8NBHGPCphp_2jA>

**Async Art 平台**于今日宣布推出生成型音乐 NFT 工具 Async Music Blueprint。Async 音乐蓝图采用了与 Async 蓝图相似的创作过程并将其应用于音乐，音乐家不需要任何编码经验或开发人员的帮助，就可以创造生成音乐项目。其 Async Canvas 工具允许创作者将歌曲的音轨分层，并在这些音轨里添加不同的变体；算法在收藏家 mint 时，从这些音轨的组合中随机构成一个独特的音频版本。<https://async.art/blueprints?category=music>

前 NASA 宇航员、国际空间站指挥官、航天飞机飞行员 Terry Virts 上校在推特上发布了一则视频，视频号召全世界航天爱好者参与 MoonDAO 在 6 月 3 号开始的太空门票 NFT 活动。<https://twitter.com/OfficialMoonDAO/status/1532190339464716288>

**Layer2**

Dune Analytics 数据，Optimism 首批空投中已有 61.65% 的 OP被申领，此外，已有超 47.36% 的用户完成了申领。<https://dune.com/Marcov/OP-Optimism>

Stargate 发布新版 OP Token 分配的提案并已开启投票，该提案计划将 100 万枚 OP Token 中的 70 万枚用于流动性挖矿计划，剩余 30 万枚用于合作伙伴计划，两项计划均将持续 6 个月。<https://snapshot.org/#/stgdao.eth/proposal/0x9c7ee3298c62d284b11bc29de1a2a55e72d1a5f5d74860adf65380093ce9a2be>

**政策&项目进展**

**Gitcoin** 宣布将于 6 月 8 日开启第 14 轮捐赠活动，同时以超过 300 万美元的配套资金启动 ReFiSummer，本轮捐赠将于 6 月 23 日结束。<https://twitter.com/gitcoin/status/1532141317429440514>

Coinbase 宣布与 Gitcoin 合作并承诺投入 100 万美元，持续支持数字公共产品或支持开源协议的开源软件。这也是 Gitcoin 历史上的公共产品最大单笔捐赠。这些资金将在 GR14、GR15 和 GR16 上逐步分配。<https://blog.coinbase.com/coinbase-commits-1-million-for-public-goods-in-partnership-with-gitcoin-2c2902c5587>

NFT Layer2 解决方案 **Immutable X** 宣布推出开源核心 SDK。该 SDK 拥有更好的性能、可扩展性和可读性，方便开发者在 Immutable X 上的开发工作，并且将在未来几周内逐步发布文档更新。<https://twitter.com/Immutable/status/1532247065937739777>

NFT 基础设施服务商 Project Galaxy 宣布将基于 BNB 应用侧链推出其专属的 GAL 链。Project Galaxy 推出 GAL 链旨在为 Web3 证书带来全新的体验。通过新的 GAL 链，用户能够为 Project Galaxy 的生态管理和贡献数字凭证，然后通过应用程序模块、预言机凭证和 API 凭证使用这些凭证。简而言之，Project Galaxy 的数字身份将会有更多的用例。<https://blog.galaxy.eco/project-galaxy-launches-the-gal-chain-as-a-bnb-application-sidechain-bas-powered-by-nodereal-d8e7a2c63743>

**观点**

区块链数据分析平台 Dune Analytics 数据显示，Uniswap 上超过 50% 的交易量是由 MEV 机器人完成，而通过 Uniswap UI 进行交易的交易量仅占总交易量的 16.4%，但通过 Uniswap UI 进行交易的用户数量却占总用户数量的 62.5%。<https://twitter.com/sui414/status/1532088483296120832>

BitMEX 创始人 Arthur Hayes 在最新博文中探讨了当前的市场形势，Arthur 认为美联储加息不可持续，加密市场将在缩表预期消失后迎来反弹。仍相信以太坊将到达 10,000 美元。<https://cryptohayes.medium.com/shut-it-down-15d230b28089>

title: 更多可能
body:
你知道的越多，越发现自己的无知。你在拓宽意识边界，你在拓宽对技术手段使用。“万事互联”是我现在的体验。从luyun分享的web3指南，知道有notion这项神仙产品。第二天去去感受时，看了新手指南的四个视频，amazing。种类很多，reading/to do list、journal ect.能不能提高我的学习效率，有待商榷，因为还没有弄明白，并且，这台电脑是游戏本，太重，我也不是很习惯网上学习，逐渐适应。

![讲到 ](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/UFWuSTA4Wr4BQNAH9u8Bn.jpg?height=3286&width=1080)

一位嘉宾谈到web3.0是隐秘地公开财产，这点我觉得很有意思，因为，我们有分享欲，并通过别人的评价来确认自己的价值，但又有矛盾的心理，不想暴露自己，所以web3资产层和身份层的结合就既有现实感，又满足大众心理。

NFT，可以说我有些明白为什么叫非同质化货币，与比特币不同，不是已经成为共识的高价值稳定的保值品。创作人创造出不同的NFT，根据受欢迎喜爱程度，来形成一个共识圈，可以出价买这个NFT，获得部分或全部版权，进行再创作。在《声东击西》#183讲到有关web3.0/元宇宙的很多项目最开始都是用“庞氏骗局”的思路进行，感觉“共识”也是如此。联想到哈拉里·尤瓦尔的《人类简史》，将公司法人，称为“想象的现实”，这也是智人为什么能打败尼安德特人、直立人等成为唯一的人属。

摘抄几段：**所谓“想象的现实”指的是某件事人人都相信，而且只要这项共同的信念仍然存在，力量就足以影响世界。**

从认知革命以来，智人一直就生活在一种双重的现实之中。一方面，我们有像是河流、树木和狮子这种确实存在的客观现实；而另一方面，我们也有像是神、国家和企业这种想象中的现实。

通过文字创造出想象的现实，就能让大批互不相识的人有效合作，而且效果还不只如此。正由于大规模的人类合作是以虚构的故事作为基础，只要改变所讲的故事，就能改变人类合作的方式。只要在对的情境之下，这些故事就能迅速改变。例如在1789年，法国人几乎是在一夕之间，相信的故事就从“天赋君权”转成“人民做主”。因此，自从认知革命之后，智人就能依据不断变化的需求迅速调整行为。这等于开启了一条采用“文化演化”的快速道路，而不再停留在“基因演化”这条总是堵车的道路上。走上这条快速道路之后，智人合作的能力一日千里，很快就远远甩掉了其他所有人类和动物物种。

扯远了，那就再扯一点。又想到尼采的视角主义。

摘录于《刘擎西方现代思想讲义》：

 视角主义究竟是怎么回事呢？用一句话来概括，就是“视角决定事实”。

   传统认知模式有一个前提假定：认为存在一个客观的真相或者真理。我们去认知它，就是努力地去理解这个真相，再把它表达出来，只要不断向前推进，就可以越来越接近这个真相，最终完全认识和掌握真相。

就好像苏东坡的庐山，身在此山中的时候，看不到庐山真面目，但如果远近高低绕着它看一圈，就能认识到庐山真面目。声音也是一样，虽然人的耳朵只能听到某些频率的声音，但我们用科学工具不断探测、研究，就能了解到声音本质上是一种声波。

但尼采的视角主义和这些完全不同，它是完全颠覆了传统的认知模式。视角主义不是说不同的视角会对同一个客观真相得出不同的主观认知，而是要说根本就不存在一个客观真相。

尼采认为，“存在一个客观真相”不过是一厢情愿的假设。没有任何人能确定是否存在这个所谓的“客观真相”。如果说有谁能看到这个绝对的客观真相，那只能是全知全能的上帝。但别忘了，上帝已经“死了”。不管怎样，人类不可能确定存在一个绝对真相。人能得到的，就是一个个不同的视角看到的不同真相。更准确地说，人不是“看到”真相，而是“制造”了真相。

（前面内容是科学真理该如何解释呢）根据视角主义的观点，这种“客观性”不过是一种合理的错觉。因为人们在这些问题上具有共同的视角，得出了一致的解释，才造成了这种错觉。其实客观事实也会变，它会随着“共同视角”的变化而变化。

比如说在过去，月食的真相就是天狗吃月亮。但现在，月食的真相是，太空中月球运行到了地球的影子里。对月食这件事，过去的共同视角是一种神话的视角。而现在，我们共享的是一种天文学的视角。

  **概括地讲，视角主义认为事实有没有所谓的“客观性”，其实取决于人们对这件事有没有“共同视角”。“客观”只是一种错觉。但这种错觉很重要，因为我们需要一些稳定的事实认知，很多人类活动只有在此基础上才能正常展开。**

扯回来，就像luyun在指南中写道，**许多NFT项目存在滥发、圈钱等乱象，请慎重进行NFT交易和买卖！！！**

尤其是我这种大学生，没钱没积蓄，先多看看再说吧。因为听《硅谷101》讲stpen这期，前期投资买鞋，于我而言就是个大门槛。加上现在对gas，token还不了解，连韭菜都当不了哎。

title: 掌权者对我下命令，我就一定得照做？│ 林前11:10 做个记号
body:
**罗马书‬13:1-2**
在上有权柄的，人人当顺服他，
因为没有权柄不是出神的。
凡掌权的都神所命的。
所以，抗拒掌权的就是抗拒神的命；
抗拒的必自取刑罚。

圣经告诉我们要顺服掌权者。那么是不是掌权者的所有命令我都必须遵行呢？

老板让我做假账，我也要做吗？
政府不许我传道，我就不传吗？

当然不是。

注意第二节保罗说：抗拒掌权的，就是抗拒神的命。  
 这话反过来也成立：顺服掌权的，就是顺服神的命。

如果顺服掌权者，会导致我违背从神而来的命令，那我还应该顺服吗？

答案是：**你要顺服人，但不必服从**。

![顺服 ≠ 服从](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ZYG0Z-5-8P2tHZbZYdYGa.jpg?height=1728&width=3072)

服从就是照做。我们应当服从神，照着神的话去做。但在人和人的关系上，顺服是一个更贴切的词。**顺服是一种恭敬、尊重的态度**。**这种对人的尊重和恭敬，立足于神对世人——对全世界的每个人——无条件的爱**。

‪**约翰福音‬3:16-17**神爱世人，
甚至将他的独生子赐给他们，
叫一切信他的，不至灭亡，反得永生。
因为神差他的儿子降世，
不是要定世人的罪（或作“审判世人”。下同），
乃是要叫世人因他得救。

神既是这样爱我们，我们也当彼此相爱。怀着这样的爱，有了这样恭敬、尊重的态度，你就会尽量去配合上级的要求。**实在配合不了的话，也不妨碍你继续怀着恭敬与尊重对待他**。

![对人的恭敬和尊重，是出于神对世人无条件的爱](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/yydbX4D4_xPNetefCyC8W.jpg?height=440&width=785)

**新约里所有关于”顺服人“的经文，不是彼得写的，就是保罗写的**。从这两个人对掌权者的态度里，我们就能明白什么是顺服。

在使徒行传第4章，彼得在美门口治好了一个瘸腿的人，结果就被逮捕了。第二天，官府、长老，和文士在耶路撒冷聚会， 几位大祭司和他们的亲族也都在。他们质问使徒说：你们用什么能力，奉谁的名做这事？

那时彼得被圣灵充满——注意他是在圣灵充满的状态下回答祭司和官长的话——对他们说：“治民的官府和长老啊，……站在你们面前的这人得痊愈是因你们所钉十字架、神叫他从死里复活的拿撒勒人耶稣基督的名……“**彼得以平民百姓的身份对他们说话，而且一上来就承认了他们作为执政掌权者的地位**。

然后，彼得对他们传讲耶稣基督之名。

虽然这个名是掌权者们最不愿意听见的，可彼得仍然抓住一切机会，把福音也传给这些人。**他所行的神迹，和他有理有节、不卑不亢的态度，叫掌权者们大大”希奇“，而且”无话可驳“**。

![彼得被圣灵充满，对官长和祭司长说话](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/tBNRMkViY9jVuLJp3g0_M.jpg?height=768&width=1024)

最后他们实在没法子，就把使徒恐吓一番，禁止他们奉耶稣的名讲论教训人。**面对这样毫无道理的要求，可同时又是来自权威的压力，彼得是怎么回答的**？

‪**使徒行传‬4:19-20**
彼得、约翰说：
“听从你们，不听从神，
这在神面前合理不合理，你们自己酌量吧！我们所看见所听见的，不能不说。”

彼得自己说过：百姓要顺服君王。可他却在众人面前这样跟官长们顶嘴？——这就是顺服，但却不服从。**彼得没有服从官长和祭司的命令，因为他们的命令与神的话相悖**。**但彼得仍然尊重官府的权威、承认国家的法律，哪怕这个法律制订得并不合理**。他没有多费口舌跟官长和祭司们争辩，只是礼貌、克制地告诉他们：要杀要剐是你们的决定，而我已经决定了要听从神。

他顺服的结果是什么？——他们被释放，回到会友那里，所有人一起祷告，聚会的地方就被神的大能震动了！主就照他们所求的，赐给他们胆量和口才，也伸出祂的手来医治疾病，使神迹奇事因着耶稣的名多多行出来。

![先有顺服神和尊敬人的态度，祷告就带下了神的大能](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/mbcTQhIllu7XIILpyYJka.jpg?height=768&width=1024)

保罗也是一样。**他带四个人去圣殿里行洁净的礼，因为他要向耶路撒冷的犹太教会表明他顺服的态度**——向律法以下的人，他虽不在律法以下，还是作律法以下的人，为要得律法以下的人。但即使这样，从亚细亚来的犹太人还是诽谤他，说他把外邦人带进圣殿，污秽圣所，怂恿众人抓住他。

第二天千夫长来审问。保罗才说了一句话，大祭司亚拿尼亚就吩咐旁边站着的人打他的嘴。这让保罗感到委屈又生气。

‪**使徒行传‬23:3-5**保罗对他说：“你这粉饰的墙，神要打你！
你坐堂为的是按律法审问我，你竟违背律法，吩咐人打我吗？”站在旁边的人说：“你辱骂　神的大祭司吗？”保罗说：“弟兄们，我不晓得他是大祭司；经上记着说：‘不可毁谤你百姓的官长。’”

保罗指责那个审判他的人是“粉饰的墙”，还说“神要打你”，这听起来就是语气很重的骂人吵架的话了。但当旁边的人告诉他，这个“粉饰的墙”是神的大祭司，保罗就还是压下怒气，表明自己并不是针对大祭司，只是在抗议这个随便打人巴掌的行为，因为这个行为违背了律法。

简单来说，保罗的意思是他对事不对人。**不管对方是不是祭司，他随便打人，保罗都会抗议，也会拿起律法的武器保护自己的权利**。**这并非不尊重祭司的职分，只是不认同打人巴掌的行为**。

![保罗的反击是对事不对人，更不是针对神所设立的祭司制度和摩西的律法](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/bWTFaJhsb1x77EuPSimwN.jpg?height=768&width=1024)

尊重官长和祭司，并不代表你同意他们的看法。但即使不同意，也还是要尊重，因为你不仅是在把他们作为“神所爱的世人”来尊重，更是尊重他们的“职位”。职位可以由不同人来坐，有人做得好，有人做得坏，但职位本身的属性不会变。这些职位是神设立的，“凡掌权的都是神所命的”，与职位相匹配的权柄也是从神而来。承认这个权柄的等次，就是顺服神。**只有你顺服了，你有话好好对人说，那么在你有话对神祷告时，你的祷告才是有效的**；在你向世人——包括审问你、挑衅你、逼迫你的人——传讲福音时，你的话语才会带下神的大能。

这是什么原理呢？我们可以从保罗讲顺服的一段经文里找到答案：

‪**哥林多前书‬11:5,10 
 **凡女人祷告或是讲道， 
 若不蒙着头，就羞辱自己的头，
因为这就如同剃了头发一样。……
因此，女人为天使的缘故， 
 应当在头上有服权柄的记号。

**我们为天使的缘故，应当在头上有服权柄的记号**。在当年保罗所处的社会文化中，这个记号是指蒙住头发，而在今天我们所处的社会文化中，这个记号是指对人的恭敬和尊重。**我口中和气的言语，加上我尊重并且尽量配合的态度，就是我顺服权柄的记号**。我顺服是为天使的缘故，因为

**‪希伯来书‬1:14 
 **天使岂不都是服役的灵、
奉差遣为那将要承受救恩的人效力吗？

![每个承受救恩的人，都能差遣天使为我们效力](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/KSZFrBqD2ViB9ZmgNSEUF.jpg?height=420&width=800)

我们的祷告能发动天使，所以彼得被关在监狱里，第二天就要死刑示众，教会为他切切祷告神，就有天使向他显现，半夜领他走出了监狱的大门。这对初期教会的人来说并不是一件新鲜事，甚至彼得回到自己人那里，众人还不敢相信是他，说：“这必是他的天使！”

**差遣天使的前提，是我们在头上有服权柄的记号**。等我们顺服了，神的天使就会因我们的祷告应声而动，去为我们在灵界里对付魔鬼、扫清障碍，在我们目力所不能及的地方，为我们铺平前面的道路。

所以我们看到彼得和保罗屡遭逼迫，屡次入狱，却因一路有天使保守而次次得以脱险。他们遭受逼迫，是因为不肯服从官府和犹太公会的禁令，四处去传耶稣基督的福音。他们得拯救，是因为他们在逼迫中始终保持了对权柄的顺服，和对掌权者们的尊重。**他们在头上有服权柄的记号，所以他们的每次祷告都能带下神的大能，也让福音得以传到更远的地方**。

![差遣天使的前提，是我们在头上有服权柄的记号](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Wmnrnc09uosDf-lGHOqCJ.jpg?height=768&width=1024)

因此当我们面对掌权者的要求时，要自己做一个判断：如果去做这件事，会不会让我良心有愧？这件事是否从违背了神的命令？在新约时代，最大的诫命就是爱。**爱是不加害于人的，所以爱就完全了律法。那我去做这件事，本质是爱人还是在害人**？

**想清楚这个问题后，该服从的就服从**——当得粮的，给他纳粮；当得税的，给他上税；当惧怕的，惧怕他；当恭敬的，恭敬他——**如果不应该服从，该有的恭敬也还是应该有**。你可以怀着温柔、敬畏的心，怀着顺服的态度，向对方说明你不能配合的缘由。

**‪彼得前书‬3:13-15 
 **你们若是热心行善，有谁害你们呢？ 
 你们就是为义受苦，也是有福的。
不要怕人的威吓（“的威吓”或作“所怕的”）， 
 也不要惊慌；
只要心里尊主基督为圣。
有人问你们心中盼望的缘由，就要常作准备，
以温柔、敬畏的心回答各人；

不要惊慌，不要惧怕。不要怕人的威吓，也不要怕别人所怕的。**顺服归根到底是为了行善，有什么比传福音更大的善呢**？福音让人明白真道，得着耶稣基督里丰盛的生命。**当你为基督的缘故去爱人、恭敬人、顺服人的时候，就是天使为你效力，圣灵与你同工，让你在人前成为福音见证的时刻**。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/meTiIfpNK7gyedfuK83Ka.png?height=2688&width=1242)

他顺服的结果是什么？——他们被释放，回到会友那里，所有人一起祷告，聚会的地方就被神的大能震动了！主就照他们所求的，赐给他们胆量和口才，也伸出祂的手来医治疾病，使神迹奇事因着耶稣的名多多行出来。

![先有顺服神和尊敬人的态度，祷告就带下了神的大能](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/mbcTQhIllu7XIILpyYJka.jpg?height=768&width=1024)

保罗也是一样。**他带四个人去圣殿里行洁净的礼，因为他要向耶路撒冷的犹太教会表明他顺服的态度**——向律法以下的人，他虽不在律法以下，还是作律法以下的人，为要得律法以下的人。但即使这样，从亚细亚来的犹太人还是诽谤他，说他把外邦人带进圣殿，污秽圣所，怂恿众人抓住他。

第二天千夫长来审问。保罗才说了一句话，大祭司亚拿尼亚就吩咐旁边站着的人打他的嘴。这让保罗感到委屈又生气。

‪**使徒行传‬23:3-5 
 **保罗对他说：“你这粉饰的墙，神要打你！
你坐堂为的是按律法审问我， 
 你竟违背律法，吩咐人打我吗？”

站在旁边的人说：“你辱骂　神的大祭司吗？”保罗说：“弟兄们，我不晓得他是大祭司；经上记着说：‘不可毁谤你百姓的官长。’”

保罗指责那个审判他的人是“粉饰的墙”，还说“神要打你”，这听起来就是语气很重的骂人吵架的话了。但当旁边的人告诉他，这个“粉饰的墙”是神的大祭司，保罗就还是压下怒气，表明自己并不是针对大祭司，只是在抗议这个随便打人巴掌的行为，因为这个行为违背了律法。

简单来说，保罗的意思是他对事不对人。**不管对方是不是祭司，他随便打人，保罗都会抗议，也会拿起律法的武器保护自己的权利**。**这并非不尊重祭司的职分，只是不认同打人巴掌的行为**。

![保罗的反击是对事不对人，更不是针对神所设立的祭司制度和摩西的律法](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/bWTFaJhsb1x77EuPSimwN.jpg?height=768&width=1024)

尊重官长和祭司，并不代表你同意他们的看法。但即使不同意，也还是要尊重，因为你不仅是在把他们作为“神所爱的世人”来尊重，更是尊重他们的“职位”。职位可以由不同人来坐，有人做得好，有人做得坏，但职位本身的属性不会变。这些职位是神设立的，“凡掌权的都是神所命的”，与职位相匹配的权柄也是从神而来。承认这个权柄的等次，就是顺服神。**只有你顺服了，你有话好好对人说，那么在你有话对神祷告时，你的祷告才是有效的**；在你向世人——包括审问你、挑衅你、逼迫你的人——传讲福音时，你的话语才会带下神的大能。

这是什么原理呢？我们可以从保罗讲顺服的一段经文里找到答案：

‪**哥林多前书‬11:5,10** 
 凡女人祷告或是讲道， 
 若不蒙着头，就羞辱自己的头，
因为这就如同剃了头发一样。……
因此，女人为天使的缘故， 
 应当在头上有服权柄的记号。

**我们为天使的缘故，应当在头上有服权柄的记号**。在当年保罗所处的社会文化中，这个记号是指蒙住头发，而在今天我们所处的社会文化中，这个记号是指对人的恭敬和尊重。**我口中和气的言语，加上我尊重并且尽量配合的态度，就是我顺服权柄的记号**。我顺服是为天使的缘故，因为

‪**希伯来书‬1:14** 
 天使岂不都是服役的灵、
奉差遣为那将要承受救恩的人效力吗？

![每个承受救恩的人，都能差遣天使为我们效力](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/KSZFrBqD2ViB9ZmgNSEUF.jpg?height=420&width=800)

我们的祷告能发动天使，所以彼得被关在监狱里，第二天就要死刑示众，教会为他切切祷告神，就有天使向他显现，半夜领他走出了监狱的大门。这对初期教会的人来说并不是一件新鲜事，甚至彼得回到自己人那里，众人还不敢相信是他，说：“这必是他的天使！”

**差遣天使的前提，是我们在头上有服权柄的记号**。等我们顺服了，神的天使就会因我们的祷告应声而动，去为我们在灵界里对付魔鬼、扫清障碍，在我们目力所不能及的地方，为我们铺平前面的道路。

所以我们看到彼得和保罗屡遭逼迫，屡次入狱，却因一路有天使保守而次次得以脱险。他们遭受逼迫，是因为不肯服从官府和犹太公会的禁令，四处去传耶稣基督的福音。他们得拯救，是因为他们在逼迫中始终保持了对权柄的顺服，和对掌权者们的尊重。**他们在头上有服权柄的记号，所以他们的每次祷告都能带下神的大能，也让福音得以传到更远的地方**。

![差遣天使的前提，是我们在头上有服权柄的记号](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Wmnrnc09uosDf-lGHOqCJ.jpg?height=768&width=1024)

因此当我们面对掌权者的要求时，要自己做一个判断：如果去做这件事，会不会让我良心有愧？这件事是否从违背了神的命令？在新约时代，最大的诫命就是爱。**爱是不加害于人的，所以爱就完全了律法。那我去做这件事，本质是爱人还是在害人**？

**想清楚这个问题后，该服从的就服从**——当得粮的，给他纳粮；当得税的，给他上税；当惧怕的，惧怕他；当恭敬的，恭敬他——**如果不应该服从，该有的恭敬也还是应该有**。你可以怀着温柔、敬畏的心，怀着顺服的态度，向对方说明你不能配合的缘由。

‪**彼得前书‬3:13-15** 
 你们若是热心行善，有谁害你们呢？ 
 你们就是为义受苦，也是有福的。
不要怕人的威吓（“的威吓”或作“所怕的”）， 
 也不要惊慌；
只要心里尊主基督为圣。
有人问你们心中盼望的缘由，就要常作准备，
以温柔、敬畏的心回答各人；

不要惊慌，不要惧怕。不要怕人的威吓，也不要怕别人所怕的。**顺服归根到底是为了行善，有什么比传福音更大的善呢**？福音让人明白真道，得着耶稣基督里丰盛的生命。**当你为基督的缘故去爱人、恭敬人、顺服人的时候，就是天使为你效力，圣灵与你同工，让你在人前成为福音见证的时刻**。

title: 掌权者对我下命令，我就一定得照做？│ 林前11:10 做个记号
body:
**罗马书‬13:1-2**
在上有权柄的，人人当顺服他，
因为没有权柄不是出神的。
凡掌权的都神所命的。
所以，抗拒掌权的就是抗拒神的命；
抗拒的必自取刑罚。

圣经告诉我们要顺服掌权者。那么是不是掌权者的所有命令我都必须遵行呢？

老板让我做假账，我也要做吗？
政府不许我传道，我就不传吗？

当然不是。

注意第二节保罗说：抗拒掌权的，就是抗拒神的命。  
 这话反过来也成立：顺服掌权的，就是顺服神的命。

如果顺服掌权者，会导致我违背从神而来的命令，那我还应该顺服吗？

答案是：**你要顺服人，但不必服从**。

![顺服 ≠ 服从](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ZYG0Z-5-8P2tHZbZYdYGa.jpg?height=1728&width=3072)

服从就是照做。我们应当服从神，照着神的话去做。但在人和人的关系上，顺服是一个更贴切的词。**顺服是一种恭敬、尊重的态度**。**这种对人的尊重和恭敬，立足于神对世人——对全世界的每个人——无条件的爱**。

‪**约翰福音‬3:16-17**神爱世人，
甚至将他的独生子赐给他们，
叫一切信他的，不至灭亡，反得永生。
因为神差他的儿子降世，
不是要定世人的罪（或作“审判世人”。下同），
乃是要叫世人因他得救。

神既是这样爱我们，我们也当彼此相爱。怀着这样的爱，有了这样恭敬、尊重的态度，你就会尽量去配合上级的要求。**实在配合不了的话，也不妨碍你继续怀着恭敬与尊重对待他**。

**新约里所有关于”顺服人“的经文，不是彼得写的，就是保罗写的**。从这两个人对掌权者的态度里，我们就能明白什么是顺服。

虽然这个名是掌权者们最不愿意听见的，可彼得仍然抓住一切机会，把福音也传给这些人。**他所行的神迹，和他有理有节、不卑不亢的态度，叫掌权者们大大”希奇“，而且”无话可驳“**。

body:
![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/WhqPdiip3G5uhyPPM-JJS.png?height=901&width=1777)

 ซึ่งผมได้ upload เป็น video ไว้ใน youtube แล้วผ่านทาง [link](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-olBUdU84-c) นี้ 

สำหรับ blog นี้ จะพูดถึงวิธีการเข้าใช้ Grafana และการ update เพื่อนๆ สามารถดูเป็น video ได้ทาง 2 link นี้ [grafana](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nNtDUNfHN1s&t=61s) และ [update](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aW46Va4bXrQ&t=3s)

## วิธีการเข้าใช้ Grafana 

1) เข้าไป copy ip4 จาก cloud server ที่เราใช้ (ในที่นี้เลือกใช้เป็น digital ocean)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/1bfMr0LNQe0LMbnDh2MeD.png?height=469&width=1117)

2) นำ ipv4 ที่ copy ไว้นำไปวางที่ url และต่อท้ายด้วย :3008

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/nCxeFvNLYEImt9E7JPw8R.png?height=36&width=175)

3) จะพบกับหน้าต่าง log in ของ Grafana โดย username และ password เริ่มต้นคือ admin 
 เมื่อ log in แล้ว ระบบจะให้เราทำการเปลี่ยน password

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/EFDsV9yuJkSnzGz6HaBV2.png?height=854&width=820)

4) เมื่อเข้ามาแล้วเราสามารถเลือก dashboard ตามที่ต้องการได้ (ผมชอบใช้ Host Stats Entended)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/O5jrKvUCbsrj5BVSaFUiX.png?height=901&width=1777&size=large)

เมื่อเลือก Host Stats Entended จะปรากฏ dashboard ตามภาพ ซึ่งจะแสดงข้อมูลต่างๆไม่ว่าจะเป็น CPU, RAM หรือ traffic ของข้อมูล เป็นต้น

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/5NGZHqVDyq2XKRuYg-ZHF.png?height=828&width=1919&size=large)

## วิธีการ update connext router 

ใน blog นี้จะเป็นการ update ใน version 0.2.0-beta.8 (ในปัจจุบันมี version 0.2.0-beta.10 แล้ว แต่ยังมีปัญหาอยู่ แต่มีวิธีการ update เหมือนกัน) 
  
 แต่ก่อนอื่นให้เลือก directory ไปที่ nxtp-router-docker-compose ก่อน 
 โดยใช้คำสั่ง cd nxtp-router-docker-compose/ 
  
 หลังจากนั้นให้ run ทีละบรรทัดตามนี้

```
docker-compose down 
cp .env.example .env 
sed -i 's/latest/0.2.0-beta.8/g' .env 
docker pull ghcr.io/connext/router:0.2.0-beta.8 
docker-compose pull 
docker-compose up -d
```

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/hmP_q5ase_G27RTPP0xWL.png?height=568&width=793)

เท่านี้ connext router ของเพื่อนๆก็จะได้รับการ update เรียบร้อยแล้ว


---

title: WHY WE NEED MORE WOMEN IN WEB3.0
body:
**1.0    What is web3.0?**

Web3.0 is an umbrella term for a number of decentralized technologies that together make up the third generation of the internet. These technologies include decentralized storage, computing, messaging, and identity systems. Web3.0 aims to return power to users who have long been exploited by centralizing forces such as governments, corporations, and social networks.

**1.1**     **From web1.0 to web3.0 – How far have come?**

Web 1.0 was the first stage of the World Wide Web where it was used as a platform for information sharing. It was limited to static pages that could be accessed by users through browsers. Web 2.0 is the second stage of the World Wide Web which introduced user-generated content, social networking and collaboration tools, and web syndication technologies. In this stage, websites became more interactive and allowed for greater user engagement. Web 3.0 is the third stage of the World Wide Web which seeks to integrate the web into every aspect of people’s lives. It focuses on using the internet as a platform for delivering services and applications directly to users.

**2.0     Current Statistics for women in web3.0**

There are no definitive statistics for women in web3.0, as the field is still relatively new and constantly evolving. However, there are a number of studies that provide insights into the current state of women in tech and their experiences in web3.0. For example, a study by PEW Research Center (https://www.pewresearch.org/fact-tank/2017/10/10/women-are-more-concerned-than-men-about-gender-discrimination-in-tech-industry/) found that women are significantly underrepresented in the tech industry, making up only 26% of the workforce. Moreover, a report by the National Center for Women & Information Technology (NCWIT) (https://ncwit.org/resource/bythenumbers/) found that while women constitute 47% of the workforce overall, they only make up 18% of computer science professionals.

Overall, it is evident that women still face significant challenges when it comes to advancement in web3.0. This is largely because they often do not have the same access to opportunities and resources as their male counterparts. As a result, we must continue to raise awareness of these issues and work to create a more inclusive environment for women in web3.0

**3.0     Why equity is critical in web3?**

The web3.0 protocol has the potential to revolutionize how the internet is used, by providing a more secure and transparent platform for communication and transactions. By becoming more widely adopted, web3.0 could help to improve security and trust online, as well as reduce the risk of fraud and scams. Additionally, it could enable more seamless and efficient cross-border transactions, and improve access to information and services for people all over the world.

The web3 community is still very much a boys’ club. The percentage of women in the space is noticeably lower than other tech-related communities. This imbalance can be attributed to a number of factors, including a lack of encouragement and opportunities for girls and young women to get into coding and blockchain development, as well as the many unconscious biases that exist in the tech industry at large.

There are a number of reasons why it’s important to have more women in web3. First and foremost, it’s simply fair. Women represent half of the world’s population and should be equally represented in all aspects of life, including the tech industry. Second, having more women in web3 can help to promote diversity of thought and bring new perspectives to bear on developing new technologies. Finally, studies have shown that companies with greater gender diversity perform better financially than their counterparts with less gender diversity.

Thankfully, there are a number of initiatives underway to increase the number of women in web3. For example, initiatives like Girls In Tech and CryptoChicks are working to increase the number of women in the blockchain and cryptocurrency industries.

**4.0     An Open Plea for women to come into web3.0**

Hello, women of the world!

I would like to invite you to join us in the web3.0 trend. This is a new era of internet usage in which users are able to interact directly with one another without relying on third-party intermediaries. Web3.0 represents an opportunity for women to become leaders in the field of blockchain technology and contribute to the development of a more equitable and secure online landscape.

Stay tuned for future articles that will go into more detail on how to get started with web3.0 and how to capitalize on this new technology.

title: DECENTRALIZED FINANCE: THE FUTURE OF FINANCE
body:
**1.0 INTRODUCTION:** 

Decentralized finance, or DeFi, is an umbrella term that encapsulates a variety of protocols and applications that allow users to borrow, lend, trade, and invest their money without the need for a third party. In short, DeFi is not controlled by a central authority like the central bank (centralized organization) as in the case of Traditional Finance.

As the world rapidly shifts to a digital economy, it's important that our financial systems keep pace. The centralized financial system (Traditional Finance/Banking) that we rely on today is far from perfect. In fact, it’s riddled with problems such as high fees, slow transaction times, and a lack of transparency. This has sparked the development of decentralized finance (DeFi), which is an emerging sector of the crypto industry that aims to solve these issues. DeFi is built on the idea of decentralization, meaning there is no need for a third party to control your funds or data. Transactions are executed through smart contracts on a blockchain network. That's why many enthusiasts believe in the potential of decentralized finance—a future where technology enables secure, transparent, and efficient peer-to-peer transactions without the need for traditional intermediaries like banks and other financial institutions.

 Many experts believe that DeFi could eventually overtake traditional finance as the go-to option for conducting transactions. There are a number of reasons for this, but one of the most important is security. Decentralized finance is based on blockchain technology, which is known for its security features. This means that users can conduct transactions without having to worry about their information being stolen or compromised. Additionally, decentralized finance offers more autonomy and control to users.
The decentralized finance (DeFi) movement is starting to take off. What started as a handful of projects has quickly mushroomed into a vibrant ecosystem with a wide range of applications. While the DeFi space is still in its early days, there are a few key trends that have emerged:

1. Decentralized exchanges are gaining traction
2. The development of stablecoins is accelerating
3. Security tokens are on the rise
4. Institutional investors are getting involved

   **2.0** **DECENTRALIZED FINANCE USE CASES:** 

   Decentralized finance, or DeFi, is coming of age. First coined in early 2017, DeFi has seen a flurry of development activity over the past 12 months as protocols and products have been built on Ethereum and other blockchains. The market is still nascent, but there are already a number of interesting potential use cases for DeFi. Some of these are: peer-to-peer lending, asset management, decentralized exchanges, and derivatives markets 

   **3.0 THE ISSUE OF INTEROPERABILITY:** Interoperability was once a problem for DeFi on its path to mass adoption. So what is Interoperability? Interoperability is the capability of a product or system to interact and function with others reciprocally. Consider our centralized financial system to illustrate the issue. In a centralized system, financial transactions are rarely limited to a single financial institution. Someone with a bank account can easily transfer money to someone with a different bank's account. Consider how difficult it would be if financial transactions were restricted to the bank with which you have an account. 

   **3.1 DeFi overcoming Interoperability through Innovations like Cross-Chains and Trustless Bridges:** 

   Bridges are essentially a technology that allows value and data to be transferred between blockchains. Though there are other methods for cross-chain transfers, such as wrapped tokens and rollups, bridges are far more efficient. Bridges typically use mint-and-burn techniques to function in this manner, burning or locking tokens on the originating chain and minting representative tokens on the destination chain. And it is through this process that they enable trustless interoperability. Now that interoperability is no longer a huge problem, we have to embark on a new journey - the journey to mass adoption of decentralized finance. 

   **4.0 DECENTRALIZED FINANCE IS THE FUTURE OF CYPTOCURRENCY:** 

   Cryptocurrency is becoming more and more mainstream as people become more and more comfortable with the idea of a digital asset that can be used to purchase items and services. The next step in the evolution of cryptocurrency is decentralized finance, which allows users to do things like earn interest on their holdings and borrow money against their assets. This will help to make cryptocurrency even more accessible to the average person and will likely result in even greater adoption.

   Decentralized Finance (DeFi) has been around for a while and is becoming more popular by the day. And, particularly since 2020, it has made a significant contribution to the blockchain-cryptocurrency sector's explosive growth and $2.87 trillion market capitalization. The DeFi protocols are still in their infancy, but as of October 2021 they have a TVL of over $233 billion. 

   The popularity of cryptocurrency is increasing at an alarming rate. In 2017, the value of Bitcoin increased by 1,500%. The popularity of cryptocurrency is due, in part, to the decentralization of this system. Decentralization is the future of cryptocurrency because it eliminates the need for third-party interference. Even though DeFi's enormous potential is clear and the above figures are impressive, they conceal more than they reveal.

   In the coming years, we will see a rise in decentralized exchanges, prediction markets, social media platforms, and more. This will revolutionize the way we do business and make it easier than ever for people to access the services they need. 

   **5.0 CONCLUSION:**

   In recent years, traditional finance has begun to retreat from control as DeFi has risen to prominence. It is the leading driver of blockchain technology. This technology has not only improved old financial procedures but has also pioneered new financial concepts. The financial industry is undergoing a rapid shift due to DeFi, so now's the time to join the train as new opportunities ensue. 

   The future of decentralized finance looks bright. With more people becoming aware of the benefits of blockchain technology, the future of decentralized finance is sure to be exciting. 

   Follow us to stay up-to-date on the latest in this exciting field, and comment with your thoughts!

## kSync 跨链交互教程（1）

此文章交互分两阶段，分为主网交互和MINT NFT，目前情况来说 zkSync 是否会有空投和领取条件或者说标准是什么还尚未可知，如果在此项目投入一点儿资金（GAS FEE) 提前埋伏一波,如果有空投的话那绝对不会让人失望的！

先让我来简短的总结下Zkrollup,与Eth主网不同，它处理的交易越多，就越便宜，并且享受了主网结算层的安全，以太坊扩容方案（Roll up） ,目前的L2的项目分为Optimistic roll up 和 ZK roll up,关于技术方面的解释对于大多数人来讲比较晦涩难懂，那本文就用最简单的方式来讲解下L2的原理 一堆人想要把钱存进银行，如果办理业务人太多会导致银行的工作达到一个饱和状态从而导致效率大大降低，L2的出现相当于是用户把钱都放到了一个管家进行托管，由管家整理好之后带入银行，从而大大缓解了银行的工作量。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/gF55wXm5oOZ03z494ifES.png?height=5145&width=12589)

大致了解过后，我们再来进一步讲解：Optimistic roll up与ZK roll up 的区别， Optimistic 的特点是 先把用户的数据处理好之后直接传给主链，7天之内有任何问题再把证据提交给主链，主链再帮用户把问题解决 ,特点是交易速度快！ ZK roll up的 机制与 Optimistic 机制相反，是先检查数据之后再发送到主网，所以相对来说交易速度相对较慢。

**创始人信息：**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/72Pp-s8648PERYqF5mc6J.png?height=693&width=1576)

**Alex Gluchowski2 Matter Labs** 的联合创始人、首席执行官，获柏林工业大学计算机科学硕士。 2003 年-2004 年，在 Design Bureau Electronprylad 公司担任初级软件开发人员； 2004 年 3 月-2006 年 10 月，在 Clarity Ukraine 公司担任软件开发人员；

2007 年 7 月-2009 年 9 月，在 Clarity AG 公司担任首席软件开发工程师，领导 20 人的 工程团队开发 Clarity Communication Center 电话系统； 2011 年 10 月-2013 年 8 月，在 ExpoGlobus 公司担任首席技术官；

2013 年 12 月-2015 年 9 月，担任 Somuchmore GmbH 公司的联合创始人兼首席技术 官，创造了第一个欧洲整体生活方式网络的最小可行产品，后被 Rocket Internet GmbH 公司收购； 2015 年 10 月-2017 年 8 月，以技术联合创始人的身份加入 PaulCamper，一家小型露营租赁初创公司，并帮助该公司成为欧洲最大 的房车分享市场；

2017 年 9 月-2018 年 12 月， 担任 Metagrid Systems 公司的首席技术官和首席研发官，**领导以太坊 Dapps 和基础设施项目的研发**；

2018 年 12 月至今，担任 Matter Labs 公司的联合创始人兼首席执行官，负责零知识证明的研究、开发、产业化应用。

### 该项目投资机构：

**Placeholder VC**：专注基于区块链的去中心化网络和技术的风险投资机构，由 Chris Burniske 与 Joel Monegro 共同创办。

投资 的项目包括：Decred、Magic Labs、Aragon Nest、3Box 等。

**1kx**：由 Lasse Clausen、Christopher Heymann 两位技术合伙人于 2017 年创立，总部位于阿姆斯特丹，专注于早期代币投资。

投资的项目有：Origin Protocol、Terra、aelf、Nervos、Ren、Beam、Arweave、Nym 等。

**Dekrypt**：专注于区块链基础设施、隐私保护技术和早期风险投资。他们投资、指导和加速团队开发新颖的解决方案，以解决分布式 协议和应用的可扩展性、隐私和互操作性等核心问题。

投资的项目包括：Oasis Labs、Handshake、Nervos、KEEP、Ren、Cortex等。

**Hashed**：又称肉末资本，原名叫 Blockchain Partners Korea，简称 BPK，是韩国规模最大的数字货币及区块链投资基金，也是不
少知名区块链项目的最大投资者之一。其总部在韩国首尔，主要覆盖韩国和亚洲，在旧金山也有办公室，影响力辐射到硅谷。

投资的项目包括：Kyber Network、Terra、Oasis Labs、Handshake、aelf、IoT Chain 等。

**Dragonfly Capital Partners**：由美国和亚洲经验丰富的风险投资公司管理，汇集了分布式经济的主要参与者。其创始人 Alexander
Pack 也是 Bain Capital Ventures 的投资顾问，另一位创始人冯波创立了策源创投。

投资的项目包括：dYdX、Compound、Lumina、
RenrenBit、Cosmos 等。
